Texts.Chs: 虽然内容有些奇怪，但里面的配方好像是真的。
Texts.Eng: Despite the odd contents, a useful recipe lays scrawled within

[over top of a strange text detailing the care and feeding of one creature called Byakhee, red text...perhaps in blood...details the schematic for a weapon] ELDER TOME....TWO ELDER FRAGMENTS....TRAPEZOHEDRON.......SACRIFICE..
